title: nice
comment: been using this weather app since it came out.  still great!  open source too!!! the source code is important here, especially if you use location for weather info,  cuz you may travel... and some nut job could see where you are or rob your home,  or worse.... knowing you are not there...  makes you think.....

title: Text size is not adjustable
comment: The temperature icon on my notification bar is literally half the height of the one in the example pictures.

title: Thank you
comment: Really thank you this is the super most accurate weather app avalible i try almost 30 top weather apps and some of them use google like a source but no matter from where they get info its mostly wrong only this app always shows me exact temperature at every moment without mistake even with a single celsius. Thanks for updating it

title: Needs more options
comment: This skin worked we'll until my provider updated from Froyo to G'bread. Notification bar is black. When you pull down notification window skin appears white-on-white.

title: Exactly what I wanted.
comment: Exactly what I wanted. Thank you Install the "weather notification" app first, then this "skin" to get the current weather on your notification bar. Make sure to disable the "built in" skin as it for some reason lets u have both active and you will get duplicated notifications. :)

title: White text but gray background
comment: Looks ugly. Icon shows a black background that would look much nicer.

title: Can we get ICS blue text skin?
comment: Can we get ICS blue text skin? Btw white text skin works great too.. Thnx

title: Needs some work!
comment: It's great to have the metric option for the temperature (celsius) but there's no way to change the wind strength from mph to km/h.
Works great on my Blazin E4GT!
People having skin related issues, uninstall and then reinstall the new version and your desired skin, been working 24 hours+ through reboots.
Make black and white skins a default. I noticed reverts too. Unchecked default and then skin saves/works
This last update rendered it useless. Settings keep reverting on both my devices, uninstalling.
